timeline.author: wyb

replies.bodyText: Recursive happends when root node has children, so it is needed
replies.author: wangbo

timeline.bodyText:
It's better to check from back.
base: c1,c2,c3,c4,c5
rollup index1: c1,c2,c3,c4
rollup index2: c1,c2,c5
rollup index3: c1,c2
It is better that rollup index3 is the child of rollup index2 than rollup index1.
timeline.author: wyb

replies.bodyText:
For current Dpp implementation which every rollup need a shuffle, it's better to check from back.
If we change Dpp logic later which one level rollup shuffle once, we need to from head, because  we need to control the level the tree to reduce shuffle times.
replies.author: wangbo

timeline.message:
1 remove flag[]
2 find parent rollup from back
